hero.position: ...and I turn ideas into code for a living
hero.summary: A hardworking and compassionate developer, I develop web applications written in React, Vue or Svelte, with experience writing Cypress UI and unit tests in Jest. Also comfortable in using various developer tools such as Git and Jira.

skills.summary: Frameworks, Programming Languages and Tools that I am familiar and comfortable working with

works.fokus: Reminder app for tasks and events tailored specifically for students

works.kantina: A small e-commerce website for the stalls inside the universities
works.movieous: A sample theater reservation client built using React and Chakra-UI
works.zap: A simple, easy to use and private file sharing service which utilizes the AnonFiles API service
